verses.text: 行淫亂的人應當趕出教會聽說你們中間竟然有淫亂的事，這樣的淫亂在教外人中間都沒有，就是有人和他的繼母同居。

words.note: Verb-object compound: 'to commit' + 'immorality'.
Lit. 'teaching assembly'.
Refers to those outside the church or faith.

verses.text: 你們還是自高自大！難道你們不該覺得痛心，把作這件事的人從你們中間趕出去嗎？

words.note: An AABB idiom: 'self-exalting, self-important'.
Used to introduce a rhetorical question.
Introduces the object of a verb, indicating it is disposed of or acted upon.
Verb with directional complements.

verses.text: 我身體雖然不在你們那裡，心靈卻與你們在一起，好像我親身在那裡審判了作這件事的人，

words.note: Formal equivalent of 和 (hé).

verses.text: 就是當你們奉我們主耶穌的名聚集在一起，我的靈在那裡，我們主耶穌的權能也同在的時候，

words.note: Formal word for 'in accordance with' or 'to receive respectfully'.
A title for God or Jesus.
A title for God or Jesus.

verses.text: 要把這樣的人交給撒但，敗壞他的身體，使他的靈魂在主的日子可以得救。

words.note: Introduces the object of a verb, indicating it is disposed of or acted upon.
A title for God or Jesus.

verses.text: 你們這樣自誇是不好的。你們不知道一點麵酵能使全團麵發起來嗎？

words.note: Often used metaphorically for sin or false doctrine.

verses.text: 你們既是無酵的麵，就應當把舊酵除淨，好讓你們成為新的麵團；因為我們逾越節的羊羔基督已經被殺獻祭了。

words.note: Implies thorough removal.
Lit. 'pass over festival'.
Often refers to a sacrificial lamb in Christian theology.

verses.text: 所以我們守這節，不可用舊酵，也不可用又邪又惡的酵，而是要用純潔真實的無酵餅。

words.note: Emphasizes moral purity.

verses.text: 我以前寫信告訴你們，不可與淫亂的人來往。

words.note: Refers to sexual immorality, a common theme in the Bible.

verses.text: 這話當然不是指這世上行淫亂的、貪心的、勒索的，或拜偶像的人；如果是這樣，你們就非脫離這世界不可。

words.note: Refers to sexual immorality.
Refers to worshipping false gods or images.
Often used with 不可 (bùkě) to mean 'must not' or 'it is necessary to'.

verses.text: 但現在我寫信告訴你們，如果有稱為弟兄，卻是行淫亂、貪心、拜偶像、辱罵人、醉酒或勒索的，這樣的人，不可和他來往，連和他吃飯都不可。

words.note: Often refers to fellow believers in the Bible.
Refers to various forms of sexual sin.
Lit. 'greedy heart'.
Refers to reviling or slandering others.
Nominalizer, forms 'those who...'.

verses.text: 審判教外的人，跟我有甚麼關係？教內的人不是你們審判的嗎？

words.note: Refers to non-believers.
Refers to believers.
Used to form rhetorical questions or emphasize a point.

verses.text: 至於教外的人， 神會審判他們。你們要把那惡人從你們中間趕出去。

words.note: Refers to non-believers.
Often capitalized for the Christian God.
Introduces direct object before verb.
Often refers to the unrighteous in a moral sense.
